column2: "Na wɔkaa dɛ yɛmfa nsuenyi nkɔ Itali no
column3: woyii Paul nye mpokyerɛfo bi maa ɔhamupanyin bi a wɔfrɛ no Julius a ofi Augustus asogyafokuw mu no."

column2: "Na yɛkɔr Adramitium wusihɛn bi a ɔrobɔkɔ Asia afamu mu no
column3: yetui
column4: na Aristarkus

column2: "Na da a odzi do no
column3: yekegyinaa Sidon; na Julius yɛɛ Paul ayamuyie maa no kwan dɛ ɔnkɔ ne amanyimfo nkyɛn ama wɔaahwɛ no."

column2: "Na yetui fii hɔ no
column3: yekoduaa Siprus ase
column4: osiandɛ mframa sii hɛn enyim."

column2: "Na yetwaa Silisia nye Pamfilia po no
column3: yɛbaa Lisia kurow Mira ho."

column2: "Na ɔhamupanyin no hun Alɛksandria wusihɛn bi a ɔrokɔ Itali wɔ hɔ no
column3: ɔdze hɛn guu mu."

column2: "Ndafua pii na yɛnam bɔkɔɔ
column3: na yɛfonae ana yɛrebɛn Sinidus
column4: na mframa amma hɛn ho kwan no
column5: yekoduaa Kreete ase kɛpaa Salmone ho;"

column2: "na yɛberɛe berɛe paa ho no
column3: yɛbaa beebi a wɔfrɛ hɔ Ahɛngyinae Fɛɛfɛw no a Lasea kurow bɛn ho no."

column2: "Na yɛsɛɛ mber pii na nsuenyidua yɛɛ hu
column3: na dɛ Mbuadadzi ber  no etwa mu dada ntsi no
column4: Paul tuu hɔn fo
column5: , #27.9 Mpatada yi ara mu na Mbuadadziber yi wɔ."

column2: "na ɔsee hɔn dɛ
column3: Ewuranom
column4: muhu dɛ akwantu yi amandze nye adzesɛɛ pii bɛba mu
column5: nnyɛ eguadze nye hɛn yi nko na hɛnankasa hɛn nkwa so."

column2: "Na ɔhamupanyin no gyee akyerɛkwan no nye hɛn no wura dzii kyɛɛn dza Paul kae no."
"Na osiandɛ ahɛngyinae no nntsɛw yie dɛ wobedzi awɔwber wɔ hɔ ntsi
column3: hɔn mu pii kaa dɛ wobotu wɔ hɔ kyerɛ wobenya kwan edu Foniks
column4: Kreete ahɛngyinae a odzi kɔ anee pomu nye anee habanmu no

column2: "Na pomu mframa bɔɔ faafaa no
column3: wosusuu dɛ hɔn nsa aka dza ɔwɔ hɔn tsirmu no
column4: wotuu sekyɛ duaa anoano kɛbɛɛn Kreete."

column2: "Na annkyɛr na aahow dzendzen bi a wɔfrɛ no Etsifi-Epuei Mframa fii Kreete bɔe;"
"na okitsaa hɛn no
column3: ma oenntum ennhyia mframa no
column4: na yegyaa hɛnho ma ɔpaar hɛn."

column2: "Na yɛdze yerɛdɛdɛɛdɛ kɛfaa supruw bi a wɔfrɛ no Kauda ase no
column3: ɔyɛɛ dzen ana yerutum susuo hɛmba no mu;"

column2: "na wɔmaa no do no
column3: wɔdze ndzɛmba wowaaw hɛn no kyekyeree; na wosuroo dɛ wɔbɔkɔ akɔhwe Sirtis anhweatɛnkyɛmm mu ntsi
column4: wɔhohɔɔr abradaadua no ma ɔpaar hɔn dɛm."

column2: "Na ehum no bɔɔ dzendzen dze hɛn kyinkyinii no
column3: adze kyee no wotuu hɛn no mu ndzɛmba bi gui;"

column2: "na da a otsia ebiasa no wɔdze hɔnankasa hɔn nsa totoow hɛn no ho ndzɛmba gui."
"Na nda pii nna yennhu ewia anaa nworaba biara
column3: na mframa kɛsenara sii hɛn do
column4: afei hɔn enyidado dɛ wɔbɛgye hɛn nkwa nyina yewee."

column2: "Na nda pii twaa mu a edziban nnkaa hɛn ano no
column3: Paul soɛree gyinaa hɔn finimfin see dɛ
column4: Mbarimba
column5: ɔsɛ dɛ nkyɛ hom tsie me
column6: na hom emmfi Kreete emmbenya amandze yi nye adzesɛɛ yi."

column2: "Na afei dze
column3: mutu hom fo dɛ hom mma hom akoma ntɔ hom yamu; na obiara ronnhwer no nkwa wɔ hom mu
column4: gyedɛ hɛn yi nko na ɔbɛsɛɛ."

column2: "Na anadwe yi Nyankopɔn a meyɛ nedze
column3: na mosom no no
column4: no bɔfoe begyinaa me nkyɛn"

column2: "see dɛ
column3: Paul
column4: mma nnsuro: otwar dɛ ikegyina Kaesar enyim; na hwɛ
column5: Nyankopɔn dze hɔn a enye hɔn nam nyina akyɛ wo."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi
column3: ewuranom
column4: hom mma hom akoma ntɔ hom yamu: na megye Nyankopɔn dzi dɛ ɔbɛyɛ dɛ mbrɛ ɔaka akyerɛ me."

column2: "Naaso otwar dɛ yekogu supruw bi do."
"Na ne dadu ndaanan anadwe no
column3: yeridzi akɔnaaba wɔ Adria po do no
column4: bɛyɛ esuom na hɛn no mu edwumayɛfo no dween dɛ yɛrebɛn asaase bi;"

column2: "na wɔtoow susuhoma no
column3: wohun dɛ ɔyɛ abasamu eduonu; na wɔkɔr enyim kakra na wɔtoow bio no
column4: wohun dɛ ɔyɛ abasamu duenum."

column2: "Na wosuroo dɛ bi a yɛbɔkɔ akɔhwe abotan bi do ntsi
column3: wɔtoo nsekyɛ anan wɔ hɛntu tweɔn adzekyee."

column2: "Na hɛn no mu edwumayɛfo no hwehwɛɛ dɛ woguan fi hɛn no mu
column3: na wogyaa hɛmba no mu too po mu yɛɛ dɛ wɔrokɔto sekyɛ wɔ hɛnkan no
column5: "Paul see ɔhamupanyin no nye nsordaafo no dɛ
column6: Sɛ iyinom anntsena hɛn yi mu a

column2: "Nna nsordaafo no twaa hɛmba no ne ntampehoma no
column3: ma ɔhwee ase."

column2: "Na adze rebɛkye no
column3: Paul serɛɛ hɔn nyina dɛ wondzidzi
column4: dɛ
column5: Ndɛ dadu ndaanan koraa nna hom atsena edzi mbuada a hom mmfa hwee nnkaa hom ano."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi meserɛ hom dɛ hom ndzidzi
column3: na iyi fa hom nkwa ho: na nhwi kor mpo rimmfi hom mu biara ne tsir do nntɔ."

column2: "Na ɔkaa dɛm no
column3: ɔfaa paanoo
column4: na ɔdaa Nyankopɔn ase wɔ hɔn nyina enyim; na obubui hyɛɛ ase dzidzii."

column2: "Na hɔn nyina hɔn akoma tɔɔ hɔn yamu
column3: na hɔnankasa so faa edziban dzii."

column2: "Na hɛn a yɛwɔ hɛn no mu nyina yɛ akra ahaenu eduosuon esia."
"Na wodzidzii mee no
column3: wɔbɔɔ hɛn no har totoow ewifua no guu po mu."

column2: "Na adze kyee no
column3: nna wonnyim asaase no n’adaa no; naaso wohun ɔdɔndɔn bi a ɔwɔ mpoano hɔ no
column4: wotuu egyina dɛ sɛ wobotum a

column2: "Na wotwaa nsekyɛ no ahoma mu no
column3: wogyaa mu guu po mu
column4: na wɔsaan kutow no n’ahoma so; na wosii hɛnkan abradaa no maa mframa

column2: "Na wɔbɔtɔɔ beebi a apo ebien hyia no
column3: wɔdze hɛn no pemee; na ne kan ketsimii
column4: na ɔkaa hɔ pintsinn
column6: asorɛkye no ne dzendzen bubuu no."

column2: "Na nsordaafo no tuu egyina dɛ woboku adaduafo no
column3: amma obi aammbor ennguan."

column2: "Na ɔhamupanyin no
column3: ɔpɛɛ dɛ ɔgye Paul nkwa ntsi
column4: osiiw hɔn dza wosusui no ho kwan; na ɔhyɛɛ dɛ hɔn a wobotum abor mfa hɔnho nkyen po mu ndzi kan nkɔ daadze;"

column2: "na nkaa no
column3: binom butubutuuw ntaabow do
column4: binom butubutuuw hɛn no ho ndzɛmba bi do kɔree. Na mbrɛ ɔyɛe ma hɔn nyina nyaa nkwa dur daadze nye no."
